divs: Sighting DetailsI work as a technician for at&t and I was traveling south on I 880 from Hayward to Fremont and I noticed a cigar shaped object that appeared to be at a 45 degree angle above the earth in my approximation to be above the East Foothills of San Jose or Mt. Hamilton area. It first appeared as a long cigar shaped object then as I kept watching it changed into a ball of light pinpoint then it faded from view. This all happened in the course of 3 minutes from 11:20 am to 11:23 am. I tried to see other motorists also saw it but was not sure if others had seen it as well. This is the first time that I have ever seen something like this. When it was it's long cigar shape it was a whitish grey then turned into a ball that looked like a star in the mid morning sky.It wasn't spectacular looking but it was definitely not a vapor trail of an airplane from what I could tell. I don't know what it was but I am curious if anyone else saw it. Thanks, Steve
Summary: long cigar shaped at 45 degree angle from earth. above East San Jose near Mt. Hamilton
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Union City
There were no other sightings in Union City on or around October 20th 2008
